field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Contributors (persons)
field.hint: Enter the names of contributing persons (last name, first name) here and select their role

field.label: Contributors (corporates)
field.hint: Enter the names of contributing corporates here and select their role

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item.

field.label: Abstract in german
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item in german language below.

field.label: Abstract english
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item in english language below.

field.label: TUHH-Institute / Workgroup
field.hint: Choose the institute(s) or the workgroup(s), at that this work has been produced by typing the name or the code of the institute (for instance "Kommunikationsnetze" or "E-4") and using the lookup button.

field.label: ISBN
field.hint: If the item has one or more ISBN(s) associated with it, please enter it below.

field.label: ISSN
field.hint: Enter the ISSN of the journal, where this article has been published.

field.label: Journal title
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal, in that this article has been published.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Volume
field.hint: Enter the volume number of the journal, in that this article has been published.

field.label: Issue
field.hint: Enter the issue number of the journal, in that this article has been published.

field.label: Start page
field.hint: Enter the start page of the article in the original volume.

field.label: End page
field.hint: Enter the start page of the article in the original volume.

field.label: Article Number
field.hint: Enter the article number of the electronic article, if it has one.

field.label: Series
field.hint: Enter the series assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Series Number
field.hint: Enter the number of the volume in the series assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: Enter the conference name, on that this item was presented

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Publisher's version
field.hint: Enter the link to the publisher's version of this document.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Main Advisor
field.hint: Enter the name of your main thesis advisor (without academic title) here.

field.label: Referee
field.hint: Enter the name of your thesis referee(s) (without academic title) here.

field.label: Title Granting Institution
field.hint: Enter the name of the title granting institution here.

field.label: Place of title granting institution
field.hint: Enter the residential place of the title granting institution here.

field.label: Thesis-Type
field.hint: Select the generic type of your thesis here.
field.required: Select the type of thesis you want to submit!

field.label: Date of examination
field.hint: Enter the date of your oral examination associated with your document.
field.required: You have to enter the date of your oral examination. If the examinations has not been made yet, you cannot publish your thesis here!

field.label: Submission to DNB
field.hint: Should this item be harvestable via OAI (e.g. for DNB)?

field.label: Inpress?
field.hint: Is this item in press (not yet really published)?

field.label: Alliance or National License
field.hint: Please select, if this work is covered by a national or alliance license.

field.label: Note about Alliance or National License
field.hint: Text to show for a national or alliance license.

field.label: Creative Commons License
field.hint: Please choose a Creative Commons License. If you need a different license, please contact us.

field.label: uncontrolled Subject Headings
field.hint: Enter 5-6 subject headings here, that are describing the content of the document (just one subject term per line).

field.label: DDC class
field.hint: Select an appropriate subject class below.
field.required: One DDC class is required as a minimum!

field.label: Supplemented By
field.hint: This item is supplemented by research data. You can provide a persistent identifier (DOI, URN or Handle) by prefixing your input with doi:, urn: or hdl: followed by the identifier without resolver (for example type doi:10.15480/882.1264 here to reference the DOI 10.15480/882.1264). You can also provide any HTTP(S) URI to reference material without a persistent Identifier (NOT recommended).

field.label: EU funder
field.hint: For EU projects: Please fill out the next three fields.

field.label: Project
field.hint: For projects without EU funding:

field.label: Fundref-DOI
field.hint: Enter the doi of one sponsor (according to Fundref, http://fundref.org/fundref/fundref_registry.html) in the box below.

field.label: Data type
field.hint: Select the resource type of your data file(s).
field.required: The resource type of your data is required.

field.label: Title
field.required: Please enter the main title for this item.

field.label: Author
field.required: Please enter the author(s) of the dataset.

field.label: Personal Contributors
field.hint: Enter the names of the contributing persons (last name, first name) here and select their role

field.label: Corporate Contributors
field.hint: Enter the names of the contributing corporates here and select their role

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of publication below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: Please enter at least the year of your data publication.

field.label: Description (English)
field.hint: Information about content, context and reuse of your data.

field.label: DDC class
field.hint: Select an appropriate subject class below.
field.required: One DDC class is required as a minimum!

field.label: Related Identifiers
field.hint: Enter related identifiers of the item (e.g. URL, DOI, ...) and select a qualification of the relation. You can provide a persistent identifier (DOI, URN or Handle) by prefixing your input with doi:, urn: or hdl: followed by the identifier without resolver (for example type doi:10.15480/882.1264 here to reference the DOI 10.15480/882.1264). You can also provide any HTTP(S) URI to reference material without a persistent Identifier (NOT recommended).

field.label: Creative Commons Lizenz
field.hint: Please choose a Creative Commons License. If you need a different license, please contact us.

field.label: EU funder
field.hint: For EU-Projects: Please fill out the next three fields.

field.label: Project
field.hint: For projects without EU funding

field.label: Fundref-DOI
field.hint: Enter the doi of one sponsor (according to Fundref, http://fundref.org/fundref/fundref_registry.html) in the box below.

field.label: TUHH-Institute
field.hint: Choose the institute(s) or the workgroup(s), at that this work has been produced by typing the name or the code of the institute and using the lookup button.
field.required: Please provide the institute of your publication.

field.label: Automatic Deletion
field.hint: Should the files be deleted in 10 years?
